授業方法:
This course is held as a workshop with discussions, self-directed research and presentations, with communication and materials primarily in English.
*During 'State of Emergency' times, live online classes will be held at the scheduled class time on Zoom (Check LUNA for Zoom link). Students on the KGU campus can use the scheduled classroom during the scheduled class hours to attend online classes via Zoom on their own computers. N.B. If the State of Emergency is eased during semester, it may be possible to hold face-to-face classes if desired.
*緊急時には、Zoomでのライブオンライン授業が予定された授業時間に行われます（ZoomのリンクはLUNAでご確認ください）。
KGUキャンパスの学生は、予定された授業時間中に予定された教室を利用して、自分のパソコンでZoomによるオンライン授業を受けることができます。
